name: Blood and Bullets | Mini jam 115
description:
Play as a detective who has been  badly shot. Escape the onslaught of goons and get to recovery.  With only  8 bullets,  time your shots  wisely...  And don't bleed out

Can be played in browser, but the download is a better experience graphically. This is our first time  working with  an HTML5 export, so it came out a little funky.

DISCLAIMER! There is blood in this game!
